title: BRIEF-Inside Secure appoints Amedeo D'Angelo as president and CEO
text:
BRIEF-Inside Secure appoints Amedeo D'Angelo as president and CEO Sept 29 
Sept 29 Inside Secure SA : 
* Appoints Amedeo D'Angelo as president and chief executive officer Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
